message.body: When is the leunig jaz fest gig?
No word yet. Sila's workin on it.
K, lemme know as soon as we know cuz i wanna book a bunch for jazz fest and try not to double book

From Sila: Indeed. I spoke with Dave amidst the chaos of work. He hasn't gotten either of our emails yet because he apparently has like 300 about the jazzfest week. But I'll keep talking to Bob (the owner) about it, I work with him again this weekend. Just so he can give Dave that extra push in our direction. Hang tight. Xo
Dobra is opening their new space on saturday, do you want to play at the grand opening?
Sure what time? Firm up this pm with the Grup ?
